summary: The diff does not clearly implement a rollback to v59. Most notably, the frontend router setup appears to omit the required /consultation route, jeopardizing the acceptance criteria that primary routes (including /consultation) load without runtime errors. The changes also include several substantial backend/frontend feature additions (e.g., Stripe integration, blob storage mixins, user profiles, product management) that are not explicitly requested by the rollback-only BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: All primary routes load without runtime errors in the browser console (at minimum: /, /consultation, /products, /subscription, /admin).
missing_requirements.reason: The router configuration summary explicitly states the consultation route is not defined, so /consultation is unlikely to load as required.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend Stripe integration and HTTP outcalls added/kept (described as for potential future use).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is a rollback to v59 with a non-goal of adding new third-party integrations; the diff shows Stripe/outcalls code paths without evidence they are required strictly for restoring v59.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend blob storage mixin/storage support included (described as for potential future use).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the rollback requirement; appears as additional capability beyond what is necessary to restore v59 behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend user profile management APIs (get/save caller profile, admin checks) implemented.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the rollback requirement and not mentioned in v59 restoration scope; appears to be additional feature work.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend product management APIs and product category types implemented (add/update/remove/list products).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the rollback requirement; appears as additional feature work.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend profile/admin/stripe setup dialogs and various non-requested page flows (e.g., article submission, payment success/failure) described in frontend summaries.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 is limited to restoring v59; these additions are not referenced as necessary to restore consultation behavior/routes and may represent extra scope beyond rollback.
